price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߣߵߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߓߊ߲߬ ߠߊ߫ ߒ߬ ߠߊ߫ ߟߝߊߙߌ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߛߊ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߣߎߡߊ߲ߓߟߏߟߞߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyātinā hum aṣḥābu al-mashamati
